tool_description: RChilli Contact Extractor API to extract the contact details from given text.
name: RChilli Contact Extractor
title: RChilli Contact Extractor

api_list.name: RChilli Contact Extractor
api_list.description: RChilli Contact Extractor is a rest API, that uses an algorithm for extracting Name, Email, City, State, Country, Website, Phone Number, and Address from the given text content.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-contact-extractor.p.rapidapi.com/contactExtractor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-contact-extractor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
